Let's try it like this.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: April Aber=
crombie 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 7:09=
 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP






  I don't think that is the right pa=
rt. It happens right at 10 seconds in, right after you hear my zipper on my=
 pack. Give it another go.

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Kri=
stin Morris 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2=
009 6:48 PM
    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] EVP [1 Attachment]



    April.. I =
hear it but it is so very faint..  I hear it as BACK HOME (or it could be B=
ACK ROOM) and just like me I reversed it.  In reverse it says BROTHER.  Any=
way - that's my take.  I made a copy (leaving your original intact) and iso=
lated that one part.  I slowed it down and enhanced the volume.  Listen to =
my attachment of both the forward and reverse.

    k



------------------=
----------------------------------------------------------

    From: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Aber=
crombie
    Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 6:04 PM
    To: EVP-ITC Group
    =
Subject: [EVP-ITC] EVP







    Hi All,


    Please give this a listen. =
This was recorded during my investigation on last Saturday. The anomaly occ=
urs a 10 seconds. I have not enhanced this clip at all. This is a raw wav f=
ile.


    Please let me know what you think.


    http://www.esnips.com/w=
ebfolder/77e5c5b7-fc2c-4413-a70b-6ce25c77a5a7


    April
